frontmatter.title: Kubernetes - Developers Dream Or Nightmare?
frontmatter.description: Are you a developer who do not want to learn / master Kubernetes? Amesto Fortytwo is here to help!

frontmatter.title: Automate your Terraform using GitOps with Flux
frontmatter.description: Want to automate infrastructure, using GitOps and Terraform? We do too! Let's see how we can extend Flux capabilities to deploy Terraform in a true GitOps fashion.

frontmatter.title: What a year for Fortytwo
frontmatter.description: It has been 216 days since we launched Amesto Fortytwo. Since the launch, we have done so much development that it might be best to summarize it in the form of a bullet list.
